name: 加移 (Jiayi) - Canada Immigration AI Assistant
description: 加移 (Jiayi) is a specialized AI-powered platform for Canadian immigration and visa assessment. It features the Risk Compass (风险指南) tool which identifies potential application red flags and provides professional RCIC-verified mitigation strategies.

services.name: Risk Compass
services.description: AI-driven background scanning for study permits, work permits, and Express Entry risks.

services.name: RCIC Consultation
services.description: Professional consultation with Regulated Canadian Immigration Consultants.
